notYetEligible: You're not yet eligible to make a donation. Keep saving and you'll reach your milestone soon!
timeUntilDonate: {{months}} month(s) {{days}} day(s) until you can donate
reachedMilestone: You've reached your 6-month savings milestone. It's time to make a difference!
commitmentExplanation: As part of the AidVault commitment, 20% of your savings goes to children's education. You can choose to donate more if you wish!
donateMoreOption: I want to donate more than 20%
confirmationText: I understand that my donation of {{amount}} RWF will go directly to supporting children's education and providing school supplies to those in need.
makingRealDifference: Your donation is making a real difference in children's lives.
cycleReset: Your savings cycle has been reset. Start saving again and make another impact in 6 months!
confirmationRequired: Please confirm you understand how the donation will be used
invalidAmount: Minimum donation is {{amount}} RWF (20% of your balance)
